com.samsung.spensdk.applistener

Interface SettingFillingChangeListener


  • public interface SettingFillingChangeListener
    This is the S-Canvas-based listener interface that is called when fill settings parameters change.
    Since:
    S-Pen SDK 2.2

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onFillingColorChanged(int fillingColor)
      This handler is called when the fill color changes.

    • Method Detail

      • onFillingColorChanged

        void onFillingColorChanged(int fillingColor)
        This handler is called when the fill color changes.
        Parameters:
        fillingColor - The fill color
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.2
